Tools / Datasets used in Code: 


* Google Colaboratory: https://colab.research.google.com/
* Google Maps API: https://developers.google.com/maps
* Geoapify - Reverse Geocoding API: https://www.geoapify.com/tools/reverse-geocoding-online
* Google Gemini Pro : https://deepmind.google/technologies/gemini/#introduction
* Images generated by Author using Adobe Scan (https://www.adobe.com/uk/acrobat/mobile/scanner-app.html) and DALL-E 2 (https://openai.com/dall-e-2)
   * https://upcdn.io/FW25bZb/raw/travelmap/glenarnhouse_FamilyCat.png

   * https://upcdn.io/FW25bZb/raw/travelmap/boulonge-sur-mer.png 
   * https://upcdn.io/FW25bZb/raw/travelmap/notredame.png
